name: Hate-Monger
powersText:
Cunning strategist
Charismatic leader
Good hand-to-hand combatant
Armored exoskeleton battle-suit grants:
Superhuman strength
Via H-Ray:
Ability to cause feelings of intense hatred, fear and dread and to consume fear
After resurrection:
Being of pure energy
Shapeshifting
Regeneration
Ability to fire laser-like beams from his eyes }}
